name: Herb
description:
Play as Herb, a completely average man who wields a sword. Herb must fight against a giant angry robot who is intent on killing Herb. Slash, dodge, and run away in this short game made for the Epic Megajam 2020. 

Controls explained in game - Keyboard/Mouse and Controller compatible

NOTE: Mouse must be used to control menus.

Credits

Created by: Alexander Voidoc

Premade Assets used

  • Sounds provided by "Soundly"
  • Music provided by "Mega Game Music Collection" by MuzStation Game Music
  • Particles provided by "Luos's Particle Toolkit Vol. 1" by Luos
  • Sand Texture provided by "Stylized Desert Environment" by Bad Rhino Games
  • Explosion particle provided by "Explosions Builder" by W3 Studios
